mean_cn: n. 驾驶，操纵，下等客舱
mean_en: the section on a passenger ship in the past where passengers who had the cheapest tickets would stay
word_etyma: steer掌舵 + age 集合名词、总称 → n. 操舵；驾驶；管理；士官的二等室
sentence: If you're poor and you want to travel by boat, you'll have to spend your time in steerage!
sentence_trans: 如果你很穷但又想坐船出行，你就只能待在下等客舱。
